name: Marcos Gestal
content: Marcos Gestal Pose File. Department Computer Science and Information Technologies Knowledgment area Computational Science and Artificial Intelligence Research Research group Redes de Neuronas Artificiales y Sistemas Adaptativos - Imagen Médica y Diagnóstico Radiológico Research lines Computación Evolutiva; Redes de Neuronas Artificiales; Selección de variables Teaching merits evaluation 3 five years period(s) Research merits evaluation 3 six years period(s) Contacto UDC directory Orcid id0000-0002-4371-8632 ResearcherIDC-4491-2010 Scopus6507970737 Marcos Gestal, MS (2001) and PHD (2009) in Computer Science, was born in A Coruña, Spain, in 1977. Now, I'm assistant professor in the Computer Science Faculty (University of A Coruña) and member of the research laboratory Artificial Neural Networks and Adaptative Systems (RNASA-IMEDIR Group)My actual research interests are focused on evolutionary computation (mainly genetic algorithms), artificial neural networks and their interaction to perform feature selection. I have participated in several research projects, published papers in many international journals and edited and wrote his own books.çMore about me at: http://work.marcosgestal.com Subjects taught This section shows the teaching given in degrees, masters and other officers studies in last 6 years. 2025/2026 2024/2025 2023/2024 2022/2023 2021/2022 2020/2021 Subject and involved studies Type Distance hours Total hours Development Frameworks Degree in Computer Engineering Optional 0 78 Final Year Dissertation.
